alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Rio Blanco (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 23 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Colorado and northeast Utah, including the following counties, in northwest Colorado, Garfield and Rio Blanco. In northeast Utah, Uintah. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 356 PM MDT, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwestern Rio Blanco, West Central Garfield and Southeastern Uintah Counties
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
